name: Raccoon Fair
description:
As part of my school assignment, I was put into a group with 8 other people and we had to make a game within 1 week with set requirements.

The requirements were as follows:
-3rd person camera
-Carrying 1 item at a time and bringing it back to an area that adds to your score
-If you collide with the environment or trap the item gets destroyed
-3 minute timer that counts down, once timer end, game ends and score is displayed
-2 power-ups
-Random map generation and item spawning
-Sounds and particle effects

Gameplay:

You, the player, are a Raccoon that starts in the middle of the map. Your objective is to run around the map to collect the different food pieces and bring it back to your cardboard box home in the middle of the map. 

Dodge buildings, objects and traps so your food doesn't get destroyed and make use of the Speed boosts or Jump Boosts to help you get to the food and back quickly and swiftly.
